Initial Description: [quote]I'm here to have fun|and fight monsters!||Back home[;] I love|working out[;] long walks|on the beach[;] and|working out![quote]
Middle Description: [quote]Woah[;] this is|exhausting! It turns|out you CAN get|too much exercise.||But hey[;] fighting|monsters is still fun![quote]
Endgame Description: [quote]Look[;] I do really|want super-strength|and a monster truck[;]|but maybe we could|all just go home|some time?[quote]
Post Endgame Description: [quote]We defeated Lady Luck[;]|so I'm just having fun|now! Having fun and|staying hydrated!||Fighting monsters is an|amazing workout![quote]

Initial Description: [quote]I'm not here to make|friends. I'm here to win.||Everyone else is too[;]|of course - they're|just lying about it.[quote]
Middle Description: [quote]Sure[;] the dungeons|are getting harder.|Maybe someone weak|would give up.||But this is a competition|and I'm still in it|to win it![quote]
Endgame Description: [quote]This is... tougher than I|expected! If I don't win|the billion dollars I'll|have to sue for a|billion dollars!||Wait[;] why is my signature|on this liability waiver?[quote]
Post Endgame Description: [quote]You know[;] I might not|have a billion dollars[;]|but if I find enough of|those solid gold coins|they'll be worth a|whole lot in the outside|world...[quote]

Initial Description: [quote]BEEP BOOP[;] HUMANS!||Haha[;] just joking[;] I can|definitely talk. I love|colour-coded to-do|lists and pushing|myself to my limits![quote]
Middle Description: [quote]Really beeping and|booping my way through|these dungeons!||I'm sure if I try|hard enough[;] I won't|mess up any more![quote]
Endgame Description: [quote]Hey[;] could I get a coffee[;]|do you think? I've been|sleeping so badly down|here.||Haha[;] kinda funny that|I'm trying to win a life|without sleep! Isn't it![quote]
Post Endgame Description: [quote]Returning to the|dungeons is a great way|to spend time with friends|and keep myself sharp!||I even brought some|thoughtful gifts for|the monsters.[quote]

Initial Description: [quote]Oh wow[;] this place is|so cool! The doors!|The spotlights!||Oops[;] sorry[;] I mean[;]|thanks for having me|on the show![quote]
Middle Description: [quote]Are all these sets on a|big rotating stage? How|does the shopkeeper|move around so fast?||I guess if I win|ultimate knowledge[;]|I can find out![quote]
Endgame Description: [quote]The closer I look at|all these contraptions|and gadgets[;] the more|they seem built to stop|us from winning.||But that can't be right![quote]
Post Endgame Description: [quote]Now that we're not all|distracted by trying to|escape[;] maybe I'll|finally be able to figure|out how this place|works![quote]

Initial Description: [quote]Hey[;] everyone! I'm|#blessed to be going|on this amazing|adventure with you.||Don't forget to|subscribe for updates![quote]
Middle Description: [quote]Hi everyone! I'm learning|so much about myself[;]|and also about|fighting monsters!||#blesse- Oh no! There's|no signal! What's|the WiFi password?[quote]
Endgame Description: [quote]Hi everyone! Still here|in the dungeons[;] and|it's such a wonderful...|um[;] a great...  ugh[;] sorry[;]|can we re-record?||No? Oh.[quote]
Post Endgame Description: [quote]Hey[;] friends! Turns out|you loved my Dicey|Dungeons videos[;] so I'm|back for more. Hope you|like them... just don't|forget to watch my non|dungeon content as well![quote]

Initial Description: [quote]I've turned on my|former boss[;] Lady Luck|herself[;] and joined a|hapless band of dice|people.||I have no regrets!|I hope![quote]
Middle Description: [quote]You may remember|me from all those|fights where I was|a cool enemy!||But I'm glad to be|a giant fighting dice|now. This is fine.[quote]
Endgame Description: [quote]Hello there! I've made|my bed[;] and now I'm|going to burn it down!||The bed is a metaphor|for the dungeons![quote]
Post Endgame Description: [quote]I'm glad I can leave now[;]|but I lived in the dungeons|for hundreds of years.||You can't blame me|for getting homesick|sometimes...[quote]
